title: Bloomberg Businessweek+
description:
Read Bloomberg Businessweek+ weekly for all the content of the print edition of the magazine along with exclusive content and interactive features that enrich the reading experience Subscribers to the print edition of the magazine get each week's issue for FREE after validating their print subscription.

Features: 
- Easily manage your issues with an auto-archiving option for issues older than 3 months (ON by default) 
- Resize the fonts to suit your reading needs 
- Share articles via e-mail, Twitter, Facebook, Google+, and more
- Enhanced search and notes functionality
- Related Tab: Get the latest interactive market data and news on companies mentioned in articles.
- Each week's issue available from 10pm on Thursday EST

ABOUT BLOOMBERG BUSINESSWEEK 
Bloomberg Businessweek offers a global perspective to help senior executives profit from smarter, faster and more informed decisions. Founded in 1929, the magazine is a market leader with more that 4.7 million readers in 140 countries. Drawing on more than 2300 journalists in 146 bureaus across 72 countries, Bloomberg Businessweek covers the business world like no one else can.
short_desc: Bloomberg Businessweek+: all of the print edition plus interactive features.
what_is_new: - Fixed bug with spinning 'B' logo; full articles now load and can be read
